text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
You were a wonderful bartender, Gimlet! 
Seeing bottles and glasses slide and spin 
so gracefully! It was very exciting to watch♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Definitely. It was a very 
refined… performance.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
The mocktails you made us were 
incredibly delicious as well —— 
Hehe, thanks for the wonderful night♪

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
My, oh my! It is such an honor and delight 
to know that my meager performance was 
to your satisfaction, my Emerald Queen!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
—— Hey, could it be that… you went out 
of your way to open an impromptu bar in 
the school cafeteria just for me?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I remember saying "I wonder what late-night bars are like. It's unfortunate I can't exactly 
go to one." some time ago ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Hmph…… I was simply driven by my own urges of the whimsical and creative variety.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Really……? Kris, do you know anything? 
You were helping Gimlet, weren't you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I was only… an assistant. I didn't… do 
anything important. Only errands… like 
obtaining permission… to use the cafeteria.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Asking your bodyguards about your tastes… 
Looking for… four-leaf clovers to go with 
your drink…… That's all.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehehe! I see, that's all, huh♪

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: —— Heh, interpret it as you wish.
